base_description: Rectangular, gray cabinet with two doors.
part_description: The cabinet has two tall, rectangular doors with handles on the left side. It is box-shaped with a flat top and sides, and the doors are positioned at the front.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors are hinged on the sides, allowing them to swing open and closed. Inside, shelves may be present for storage, and the doors likely have mechanisms to keep them securely shut when closed.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, used for storage in homes or offices. People interact by opening the doors via handles to access contents. It may require periodic cleaning and organization of stored items.
